daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez cooks at 8am everyday, and works at the counter until 12pm, at which point relaxes. After waking up , she switch on the furnace.  She switch off the furnace at 10 am.

lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 1pm, awakes up around 6am.

work at the counter until 12:00 pm
switch on the furnace at 6:00 am
switch off the furnace at 10:00 am
catch up on some TV or read a book at 1:30 pm
